site.title: Quantus Network - Quantum-Secure Layer 1 Blockchain
site.description: A quantum-secure, open-source Layer 1 blockchain built with post-quantum cryptography and zk-proof scalability to future-proof your digital assets.

hero.title: Quantum Secure Your Crypto
hero.subtitle: Quantus Network, the L1 Blockchain for the Quantum Era

video.title: Build value on cryptography that lasts.
video.description: Quantus is here for people who see what's coming; the next wave of innovation. A future-proof, quantum-secure blockchain that can secure today's value against tomorrow's threats.

benefits.title: The Future is Quantum
benefits.description: Quantus Network is a Layer 1 blockchain designed to thrive in the quantum era. Secured with post-quantum cryptography and scaled with zero-knowledge proofs, it delivers a level of security, scalability and usability that today's chains can't match. A clean-slate design that anticipates the coming wave of quantum technology.

quantum_secure.title: Quantum Secure at Every Layer
quantum_secure.description: Secured with NIST-backed post-quantum cryptography, every layer of Quantus from transaction signatures to P2P communication is engineered to resist attacks that would break today's blockchains. Built to endure, and ready to evolve with the quantum era.

zero_knowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge by Design
zero_knowledge.description: Recursive zero-knowledge proofs keep the network fast. Instead of reprocessing everything, nodes verify compact proofs - reducing overhead and ensuring the system grows smoothly under real demand.

security_control.title: Security You Control
security_control.description: Quantus puts you in charge. You decide how assets move, how they're protected, and who to trust. Complexity is handled in the background, so your experience feels clear, secure, and built to last into the quantum future.

app.title: Quantus App
app.description: The Quantus App puts quantum security and zero-knowledge privacy directly in your hands. Every safeguard runs silently in the background, so you can focus on what matters: moving value with clarity, confidence, and control.

reversible_transactions.title: Reversible Transactions
reversible_transactions.description: Set a reversible window for every send. Made a mistake? Didn't receive the goods you were promised? Fat fingers struck again? Simply reverse the transaction before the timer's up.

readable_checkphrases.title: Readable Checkphrases
readable_checkphrases.description: No more copy-paste paranoia. Send with confidence using unique, human-friendly checkphrases you'll actually recognize. No typos, no lookalike scams, just clear, unmistakable destinations.

security_guardians.title: Security Guardians
security_guardians.description: You choose your trusted allies and give them the power to step in and intercept a transfer before it goes through. A safety net of your own design, protecting your assets when you can't.

beneficiary_recovery.title: Beneficiary & Recovery
beneficiary_recovery.description: Plan for the long term. Assign a recovery account or beneficiary to inherit your funds if you're gone. Your assets stay protected, even during unexpected events. Think of it as your will, enforced by code.

cta.title: They say quantum is years away. They said the same about AI.

team.title: The Core Team
team.description: Founded by veteran engineers from early-stage crypto startups and former CTO roles. The team combines deep expertise in applied cryptography and zero-knowledge systems with a proven ability to ship secure, scalable infrastructure.

chris.title: Chief Executive Officer
chris.bio: A technology pioneer and entrepreneur at the forefront of AI, blockchain, and quantum computing, Chris brings a rare mix of deep technical expertise and philosophical thinking. He's spent the last decade building tools that empower individuals and redefine digital trust.
achievements: Founder of BitMesh, Lunyr (LUN), and FactoryDAO (FVT)
Early contributor to foundational Bitcoin libraries
Former AI team lead at Tensor Spark, specializing in applied machine learning
Private cybersecurity and digital asset recovery advisor for HNW individuals
Focus: Cryptography, Complexity Theory, Algebraic Topology, Quantum Computing

resonance.title: Resonance Alpha
resonance.content: Public testnet, dilithium signatures, reversible transactions

schrodinger.title: SchrÃ¶dinger Beta
schrodinger.content: Public Beta Launch, features complete, ready for audit

planck.title: Planck Upgrades
planck.content: High Security Accounts, Multisignature Accounts, Hardware Wallet Integration

token2049.title: Token 2049
token2049.description: Come meet us and have a chat about quantum, blockchain, art, music or anything!

socials.title: Follow us for fun content, podcasts, interviews, wizardry and more!

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Alpha Alert! Get your weekly news-blast with sneak previews, updates, news roundup, educational content and more

footer.description: A quantum-secure, Layer 1 blockchain for people who want to protect what matters; their assets, their future, and their freedom.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.subtitle: Reach out, and let's create a universe of possibilities together!

form.name: Name
form.success: We will process your message as soon as possible.

quote.text: The atoms or elementary particles themselves are not real; they form a world of potentialities or possibilities rather than one of things or facts.
quote.author: Werner Heisenberg

content.p1: Quantus Labs LLC is a technology company based in Wyoming, USA, focused on building infrastructure for decentralized, censorship-resistant technologies. Our flagship project, Quantus Network is a Layer 1 blockchain designed to be simple, open-source, and community-owned from day one.
content.p2: We believe in the power of open protocols, proof-of-work, and sovereign ownership. The Quantus Network appâ€”available on desktop and mobileâ€”lets users store digital assets, mine new blocks, and participate in a fairer financial future without intermediaries.
content.p3: We're committed to transparency, privacy, and empowering individuals through secure, self-custodial tools.

tos.title: Quantus Network Policies
tos.intro: This policy explains how Quantus Labs LLC ("Quantus," "we," or "us") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use quantus.com, our mobile apps, desktop applications, or otherwise interact with us. We may update this policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of this policy and, when appropriate, provide additional notice on our website.

what_we_provide.title: What We Provide
items: Mobile apps (available on App Store and Google Play)
Desktop applications with integrated mining functionality
Access to our open-source code
Community newsletter and updates
Access to the Quantus Network blockchain

what_you_cannot_do.title: What You Cannot Do
what_you_cannot_do.intro: You may not use our services to:
items: Engage in illegal activities
Distribute malware or hack systems
Violate export controls or sanctions
Interfere with network operations
Provide false information

mining_participation.title: Mining and Network Participation
items: Mining functionality is for educational and network participation
You must comply with local energy and mining regulations
We make no guarantees about mining profitability or rewards
Network features may change as the protocol evolves

dispute_resolution.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute_resolution.content: Any disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration in Wyoming under American Arbitration Association rules. These terms are governed by Wyoming law. We may terminate access if you violate these terms

your_responsibilities.title: Your Responsibilities
items: Safeguarding your wallet credentials and seed phrase
Complying with local laws regarding cryptocurrency and mining
Understanding the risks of blockchain technology
Lost private keys cannot be recovered by us

non_custodial.title: Non-Custodial Design
non_custodial.intro: Important: We do not store or access your private keys, seed phrases, or digital assets. You have full control and responsibility for your wallet and assets.
items: We cannot recover lost private keys or seed phrases
We cannot reverse transactions on the blockchain
We cannot freeze or control your assets
You are responsible for securing your wallet credentials
Always back up your seed phrase in a secure location

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers and Limitations
disclaimers.intro: Our services are provided "as-is" without warranties. Cryptocurrency involves substantial risk of loss. To the maximum extent permitted by law:
items: We are not liable for any indirect or consequential damages
Our total liability shall not exceed $1
You agree to indemnify us from claims arising from your use of our services

information_collect.title: Information We Collect
information_collect.from_apps_content: We do not collect personal information through the Quantus Network applications.
information_collect.from_website: From Our Website we automatically collect:
from_you_items: Email address (if you subscribe to our newsletter)
Information you provide when contacting us
technical_items: Application crash reports and error logs

how_we_use.title: How We Use Information
items: Improve our website and applications
Send newsletter updates (with your consent)
Analyze usage to enhance user experience
Monitor for abuse and protect our services
Comply with legal obligations
we_do_not_items: Sell or rent your data to third parties
Store your private keys or transaction data
Use your data for targeted advertising

information_sharing.title: Information Sharing
items: Analytics providers (Google Analytics for website data)
Service providers who help operate our website
Legal authorities when required by law
information_sharing.note: We only share aggregated, anonymized data that cannot identify you.

cookies_tracking.title: Cookies and Tracking
items: Essential website functionality
Analytics to understand site usage
Performance improvements
cookies_tracking.note: You can control cookies through your browser settings, though this may affect website functionality.

data_security.title: Data Security and Retention
data_security.intro: We implement standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption and secure storage. However, no online service is completely secure.

your_rights.title: Your Rights
your_rights.general: You can: Unsubscribe from communications anytime
your_rights.california: For California residents: You have additional rights under CCPA, including the right to know what personal information we collect and the right to deletion.
your_rights.eu_uk: For EU/UK residents: You have rights under GDPR, including data portability and the right to object to processing.

international_transfers.title: International Transfers
international_transfers.content: Your information may be processed in the United States. We ensure appropriate protections for international data transfers.

childrens_privacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrens_privacy.content: Our services are not intended for anyone under 18. We do not knowingly collect information from minors.

additional_info.title: Additional Information
regulatory_items: Users must comply with local cryptocurrency regulations
Some features may be restricted in certain jurisdictions
We reserve the right to limit access based on legal requirements

contact_info.title: Contact Us
contact_info.address:
Quantus Labs LLC
30 N Gould St #52155
Sheridan, WY 82801
contact_info.note: For questions about this policy or to exercise your privacy rights, please use our

cookie.title: Cookie Consent
cookie.notice: This website uses cookies to understand the interests of its readers better and cater to them. Find out more in the
cookie.link: privacy policy and terms of service
